name: Games in Space
description:
Fly around in space and look at the galaxies from my favorite gaming clips.

- Use your Mouse to look around

-WASD to move FORWARD, LEFT, BACK and RIGHT, respectively

-Press 'Esc' to quit.

This is my first time uploading to my itch page and just wanted to get the actual experience. This is not a game, more so an experience.

Thanks!
